Display.InputDialog Title: $'''Search Term''' Message: $'''Input Search Term...''' InputType: Display.InputType.SingleLine IsTopMost: False UserInput=> SearchQuery
WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: $'''https://www.bing.com/search?q=%SearchQuery%''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Normal ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
# Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractList BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div:eq(1) > main > ol > li''' ExtractionParameters: {[$'''div:eq(0) > h2 > a''', $'''Href''', $'''%''%'''] } PostProcessData: False TimeoutInSeconds: 60 ExtractedData=> GeneralSiteLinks
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: $'''https://www.bing.com/search?q=Why is %SearchQuery% important''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Normal ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
# Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractList BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div:eq(1) > main > ol > li''' ExtractionParameters: {[$'''div:eq(0) > h2 > a''', $'''Href''', $'''%''%'''] } PostProcessData: False TimeoutInSeconds: 60 ExtractedData=> ImportanceSiteLinks
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: $'''https://www.bing.com/search?q=What is %SearchQuery%''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Normal ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
# Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractList BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div:eq(1) > main > ol > li''' ExtractionParameters: {[$'''div:eq(0) > h2 > a''', $'''Href''', $'''%''%'''] } PostProcessData: False TimeoutInSeconds: 60 ExtractedData=> WhatSiteLinks
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
Display.InputDialog Title: $'''File Location''' Message: $'''Input file save location''' DefaultValue: $'''C:\\Users\\Andrei\\Documents\\%SearchQuery%.txt''' InputType: Display.InputType.SingleLine IsTopMost: False UserInput=> FileSaveLocation
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: $'''General Site Links:''' AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Overwrite Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: GeneralSiteLinks AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: $'''What is it Site Links:''' AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: WhatSiteLinks AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: $'''Importance Site Links:''' AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
File.WriteText File: FileSaveLocation TextToWrite: ImportanceSiteLinks AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
